title: Visitor Missing?!
body: The Visitor who calls himself an Anthropologist, has not been seen for in the last forenight. The local village librarian expected him back with trade good. Quote, I when out of my way looking for these rare books. He had promised to show me how to make X. What am I going to do with these books it's not like anyone really cares for them. This reporter hope our dear friend is just lost, because his X was darn delicious.
